<ln l="6370" t="5597" r="11141" b="5765" baseLine="5723">

<space/>

<para l="10944" t="2059" r="11141" b="2222" alignment="right" spaceBefore="360" spaceAfter="36" lsp="single" language="en" styleRef="paraStyle_1_3_74">
<ln l="10944" t="2059" r="11141" b="2222" baseLine="2184">
<wd l="10944" t="2059" r="11141" b="2222" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="950" fontFace="Courier New" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="0">(1)</wd>

<dd l="6086" t="15029" r="6178" b="15158">
<para l="6086" t="15029" r="6173" b="15154" alignment="left" lsp="exactly" lspExact="148" language="en" styleRef="paraStyle_1_3_74">

<ln l="1219" t="9557" r="5885" b="9730" baseLine="9689">
<wd l="1219" t="9600" r="1358" b="9691">•</wd>
<tab position="1270"/>
<wd l="1358" t="9562" r="1978" b="9720"><run italic="true" underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="900" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="roman" fontPitch="variable" spacing="-1">

<run underlined="none" subsuperscript="none" fontSize="850" fontFace="Arial" fontFamily="swiss" fontPitch="variable" spacing="-1">
{</run>

<ln l="2174" t="5640" r="5472" b="5808" baseLine="5771">

<dd l="6096" t="15029" r="6173" b="15163">
<para l="6096" t="15029" r="6168" b="15158" alignment="left" lsp="exactly" lspExact="153" language="en" styleRef="paraStyle_1_7_102">
